page.title: 06Local Churches
page.content: In our area there are three churches The Christian Community Chapel,St Dominic's and St George's.The Christian Community Chapel is a free church.It is run partly by donations from local people and partly by a goverment grant given to the chapel because it looks after old people and does general community work. St Dominic's is a Roman Catholic church.It is run by donations and can expect to take about Â£200.00 a week,from an average congregation of 350 people at a busy Sunday Mass (Service).there are over 1,100 people registered in it's parish,however not all of these are regular church attenders.Some of them may attend church once or twice a year or on special occasions such as weddings,funerals or baptisms.
